text: And God gave an example/proverb (of) a village/urban city (that) was safe/secure assured/tranquillised/secured, its provision comes to it easily/comfortably from every place, so it disbelieved with Gods` blessings/goodnesses , so God made it taste/experience the starvation`s/hunger`s cover/dress/mixture and the fear/fright, because (of) what they were making/producing/manufacturing
